entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape had returned with Winky at his heels. Snape said, stopping dead in the doorway. 'Crouch!' Snape said, stopping dead in the doorway.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Filthy, disheveled, Winky peered around Snape’s legs. Her mouth opened wide and she let out a piercing shriek.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall was right behind them. 'Good heavens,' said Professor McGonagall, stopping dead and staring down at the man on the floor.

entities.name: barty crouch
entities.description: ‘Crouch!’ Snape said, stopping dead in the doorway. 'Barty Crouch!'

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: He is simply Stunned, Winky,' said Dumbledore. 'Step aside, please. Severus, you have the potion?' Snape handed Dumbledore a small glass bottle of completely clear liquid: the Veritaserum with which he had threatened Harry in class.

entities.name: veritaserum
entities.description: Snape handed Dumbledore a small glass bottle of completely clear liquid: the Veritaserum with which he had threatened Harry in class.

Filthy, disheveled, Winky peered around Snape’s legs. Her mouth opened wide and she let out a piercing shriek.

He is simply Stunned, Winky,' said Dumbledore. 'Step aside, please. Severus, you have the potion?' Snape handed Dumbledore a small glass bottle of completely clear liquid: the Veritaserum with which he had threatened Harry in class.
